scripts.build: npm run gm && npm run build-app && npm run build-api
scripts.mail-server-config: dotnet user-secrets set --project ./apps/Hafnia.LOIManagement "Smtp:Port" "2500" &&  dotnet user-secrets set --project ./apps/Hafnia.LOIManagement "Smtp:Host" "127.0.0.1" && dotnet user-secrets set --project ./apps/Hafnia.LOIManagement "Smtp:EnableEmails" "true"
scripts.mail-rm: docker stop mailslurper && docker rm mailslurper
scripts.mail-recreate: npm run mail-rm && npm run mail-create
scripts.set-user-secrets: npm run mail-server-config && npm run db-connection-string
scripts.db-connection-string: dotnet user-secrets set --project ./apps/Hafnia.LOIManagement "ConnectionStrings:ApplicationDB" "Server=127.0.0.1; Initial Catalog=Hafnia; User ID=sa; Password=Bigs3cRet; TrustServerCertificate=true"
scripts.db-recreate: npm run db-rm && npm run db-create
scripts.db-rm: npm run db-stop && docker rm Hafnia
scripts.db-initialize: docker exec -it Hafnia /opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P Bigs3cRet -Q "CREATE DATABASE Hafnia;ALTER DATABASE Hafnia SET RECOVERY SIMPLE;"
scripts.db-setup: npm run db-docker && npm run eavfw-gen-migrations
scripts.db-apply-setup: npm run db-initialize && npm run eavfw-apply-migrations
scripts.db-create: npm run gm && npm run db-setup && npm run db-apply-setup && npm run db-connection-string
scripts.eavfw-cleanup: docker stop Hafnia && docker rm Hafnia
scripts.eavfw-apply-migrations: docker exec -i Hafnia /opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -s localhost -U sa -P Bigs3cRet -d Hafnia -I -i /opt/dbinit/init.sql -i /opt/dbinit/init-systemadmin.sql -v DBName=Hafnia -v DBSchema=dbo -v SystemAdminSecurityGroupId=1b714972-8d0a-4feb-b166-08d93c6ae328 -v UserGuid=1F3EE206-2B94-4017-8EC1-F983E3E24BDE -v UserName="Poul Kjeldager" -v UserEmail=pks@delegate.dk -v UserPrincipalName=PoulKjeldagerSÃ¸rensen
